## Summary

## Testing

- [ ] `npm run validate:schemas`
- [ ] `npm run validate:examples`
- [ ] `npm run test:conformance`

## Checklist

- [ ] Linked issue (e.g. `Fixes #123`) if applicable
- [ ] Spec text updated where needed
- [ ] Examples/conformance updated if behavior changed
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated if user-facing change
- [ ] Signed-off-by present in all commits (`git commit -s`)

---

**DCO check failing?** Run `git commit --amend --signoff` then `git push --force-with-lease`
